title: Hextech Gunblade on Cass?
body: Wouldn't cass get healed like crazy with Hextech gunblade? and the slow would work great on her. why isn't it taken as much on her? it feels like such a good item on her

replies.body: It's good on her. It help her kite even more, sustain, and burst BUT Cass is extremely mana hungry.

It's good on her, but it's also very expensive and only really pays out for her once completed, making it hard to effectively slot into her build when basically everything else she wants apart from {{item:3135}} and occasionally {{item:3116}} is already fairly pricey {{item:3089}} {{item:3003}}. In most situations, she'll get effectively the same or more value from other items, although there are doubtlessly cases where Gunblade is optimal.

Gunblade is for burst assassin champs with long cooldowns. Cass is a machine gun APC...

like Ryze used to be R.I.P.

I asked around on  cassiopeiamains subreddit and ROA is just better tbh. It still gives healing and the AD on Cass is worthless. It's an expensive item that can be replaced with others such as Morello for the CDR = faster E spam.
A lot of her damage is AoE/Dot.

but the dot's get full healing as does her E

it's extremely effective especially coupled with DFT and liandries

heals for days
it is only 33% effective on AoE abilities but her E would get 15% healing from it.
its no good maybe only as a last time. but still idk if its a good option. i'd probably rather get a tank item if i wanted more survivability on her. spirit visage against ap maybe
